parameters: Resist the corruption flowing through your soul, reducing your level of depraved weakness by two. If this reduces your level of depraved weakness to a negative value, they will prevent you from gaining future levels for each negative point.

Resist the corruption flowing through your soul, reducing your level of depraved weakness by two. If this reduces your level of depraved weakness to a negative value, they will prevent you from gaining future levels for each negative point.

Speed the healing process provided by linking charges, allowing you to get more healing out of them without needing to stop and rest. Increases the effectiveness of healing charges out of combat significantly, from 50% of your maximum health to 75%.

Speed the healing process provided by linking charges, allowing you to get more healing out of them without needing to stop and rest. Increases the effectiveness of healing charges out of combat significantly, from 50% of your maximum health to 75%.

Empowered Magic: Sacrifice 15% of your max health (this can kill you!) to eviscerate one foe, dealing damage equal to 275% of your power + 27. Learning this spell does not provide extra max mana like other empowered magic skills. The damage of this skill increases by 4% per depravity level.

Empowered Magic: Sacrifice 15% of your max health (this can kill you!) to eviscerate one foe, dealing damage equal to 275% of your power + 27. Learning this spell does not provide extra max mana like other empowered magic skills. The damage of this skill increases by 4% per depravity level.

Empowered Magic: Infuse yourself with holy energy, restoring 10% of your max hp for four turns. Casting this is a free action, if you have multiple actions for any other reason, use this skill first. Learning this spell does not provide extra max mana like other empowered magic skills.

Empowered Magic: Restore 10% of your max hp for four turns. Casting this is a free action, if you have multiple actions for any other reason, use this skill first. Learning this spell does not provide extra max mana like other empowered magic skills.

Empowered magic: Sacrifice 25% of your maximum health to infuse your magic with the ability to leech strength from your foes, healing you for 40% of damage dealt in combat. Lasts until the end of the combat encounter. Learning this spell does not provide extra max mana like other empowered magic skills.

Empowered magic: Sacrifice 25% of your maximum health to infuse your magic with the ability to leech strength from your foes, healing you for 40% of damage dealt in combat. Lasts until the end of the combat encounter. Learning this spell does not provide extra max mana like other empowered magic skills.

\c[25]\fiThe purity and depravity skill tree is separated into respective sides. By either reaching a high level of depravity or reaching a goddess statue with low depravity, you will gain either depravity or purity points to invest into skills. If you gain depravity points, you can still exchange them by purifying yourself at the next goddess statue you reach, at an extra cost. When you gain points in a tree, you will unlock the next tier of skills available for both trees. So to start, you can only unlock tier 1 skills. The skill tree must be navigated with the mouse, click on skills you wish to inspect or level up, or click on the exit to leave the skill tree.\fi
\C[25]Reset this skill tree? This has no cost, and only effects skills in this skill tree.
\C[25]Reset this skill tree? This has no cost, and only effects skills in this skill tree.
Let your rage fuel you, making your spells more powerful the closer you are to defeat. Deal up to 30% bonus damage based on missing health, but take 7.5% additional damage from attacks.
Let your rage fuel you, making your spells more powerful the closer you are to defeat. Deal up to 30% bonus damage based on missing health, but take 7.5% additional damage from attacks.
Refuse to fall to your enemies, gaining up to 20% damage reduction the lower your health is, but take 5% additional damage from attacks at all times.
Refuse to fall to your enemies, gaining up to 20% damage reduction the lower your health is, but take 5% additional damage from attacks at all times.

Gain better control over your depravity, and reduce the negative impact on depraved weakness to provide a 3% increase in damage taken per level, rather than 4%. That would currently reduce bonus damage taken by \v[706]%.

Gain better control over your depravity, and reduce the negative impact on depraved weakness to provide a 3% increase in damage taken per level, rather than 4%. This currently reduces bonus damage taken by \v[706]%.
The blessing of the Goddess restores you, healing you for 20% of your maximum health after each combat encounter.
The blessing of the Goddess restores you, healing you for 20% of your maximum health after each combat encounter.
The essence of the divine speeds your spells, allowing you to cast three spells in an instant. Casting this is a free action, if you have multiple actions for any other reason, use this skill first.
The essence of the divine speeds your spells, allowing you to cast three spells in an instant. Casting this is a free action, if you have multiple actions for any other reason, use this skill first.

Repent against your sins, reducing your level of depraved weakness by two. If this reduces your level of depraved weakness to a negative value, they will prevent you from gaining future levels for each negative point.

Repent against your sins, reducing your level of depraved weakness by two. If this reduces your level of depraved weakness to a negative value, they will prevent you from gaining future levels for each negative point.
Channel the dark energy of depravity into strength. Gain 1% bonus damage for each level of depraved weakness you have. Currently, that would be \v[706]%.
Channel the dark energy of depravity into strength. Gain 1% bonus damage for each level of depraved weakness you have. Currently, that is \v[706]%.

As you gain levels of depravity, the depraved energy flowing through you weakens you, sapping your defense. After all, \c[30]giving in feels \fiso\fi good, doesnt it?\c[0] You take 4% additional damage from all attacks per level of depraved weakness, unless you have any skills that reduce this damage.
